Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Boston in 2018...
Injured on 5/2/2019 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/26/2019, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2019, off Greg Dunkley (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2021, hitting .667 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2022, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,592,857 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...

Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2023, hitting .435 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...

Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $8,564,286 through salary arbitration...

Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2024...
